nodes.documentation: the purpose of this contract is to create a market, accounts, and to manager student/tutor funds

nodes.documentation: lets front end know that the marketplace was created
nodes.name: studentAccountFunded

nodes.documentation: lets front end know that a student's account was funded

nodes.documentation:
lets front end know that a tutor's or student's funds were withdrawn
ensures that the market for language exchange actually exists

nodes.documentation: ensures that the market for students and teachers can only be created one time
nodes.name: onlyOnce

this function schedules a lesson and then it also stakes funds
Thing to pay attention to the paremeter lessonTime is a uint - this is NOT FINAL BECAUSE i AM WORKING ON DEVELOPING TIME STAMPING

createStudent(address).notice: creates a language learner with a series of attributes

createTutor(address,uint256).notice: creates a tutor with a series of attributes

fundStudentAccount().notice: funds a student account given that the account exists

getStudentInfo(address).notice: allows us to pull the students info from the blockchain

getTutorInfo(address).notice: allows us to pull the teacher's information from the blockchain

scheduleLesson(address,uint256).notice: this function schedules a lesson and then it also stakes funds Thing to pay attention to the paremeter lessonTime is a uint - this is NOT FINAL BECAUSE i AM WORKING ON DEVELOPING TIME STAMPING

studentConfirmLesson(bytes32).notice: this function allows students to confirm the lesson

studentWithdrawTotalFunds().notice: allows the students to withdraw their entire fund balance

tutorConfirmLesson(bytes32).notice: this function allows tutors to confirm the lesson

tutorWithdrawTotalFunds().notice: allows the tutor to withdraw their entire fund balance

userdoc.notice: the purpose of this contract is to create a market, accounts, and to manager student/tutor funds
